EmailTemplate.subject: New Features For Your Online Ordering - Action Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You’re just 7 days away from a whole new world of digital ordering! Great news—as an Aloha Online Ordering user, you’re getting our new Digital Ordering platform on August 25, 2021. Now, it’s even easier to manage your site, and making updates is effortless. Plus, consumers love the new look. You’ll get all these awesome features and more: - Brand and menu customization – Easily add your colors and fonts in seconds and upload images of your food to feature all your culinary creations. - Offer delivery and own your customer – Integrate your online ordering with Drive powered by DoorDash and keep your customers ordering through your digital channel. - Responsive design – Guests get the same experience whether they’re placing orders on their phone, a tablet, or a computer. Ready? Take the next step! Your Digital Ordering site’s fresh new look starts after the migration on August 25, 2021. Get ready by taking these next steps! <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rc3/ek/va/Digital Ordering Migration Instructions.pdf]]> Any questions?
